title: What kind of features make a luxury car? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm guessing you mean luxury saloons, not sportscars (correct me if I'm wrong). Size is a part of it, lots of leg space for the back passengers. Expensive materials, workmanship quality, loooooong list of standard features and available options, good sound-proofing. Design too, it's supposed to look stately and representative, not like the super-customised thing of a 20-year old with too much money. Comfortable suspension - a luxury car passenger does not want to know if the nickel the car just drove over was face-up or face-down. Gimmicks like video displays for the rear seats and a separately adjustable A/C come into play as well.

I wouldn’t say features put a car in the luxury class- most cars being built today have a great deal of “luxury features” as standard options. I would say these features would put a car in the luxury class since that was your question and I would like to answer it- Higher end interior materialsuspension (magnetic ride suspension or air ride suspension)from the factory with an ice boxheavy interior insulationill edit this answer as i do a little more research
